step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Ensure your wrists are aligned and not bending too much.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You're holding the position. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding any forward pulling motion.
You're returning to the start. Be mindful of your elbow and wrist alignment during the reverse motion.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straight and elbows close when raising your hands. Continue to focus on spreading your elbows wide and holding the stretch.
